name: right-angled
author: EastBanc Technologies
description: Lightweight and easy to use angular data grids. Integrates with your markup and styles rather than generating its own.

scripts.compile: npm run compile:es2015 && npm run compile:es5
scripts.compile:es2015: npm run ngc -- -p src/tsconfig-es2015.json && npm run rollup -- build/right-angled.js --output.file dist/right-angled.js --output.format es
scripts.compile:es5: npm run ngc -- -p src/tsconfig-es5.json && npm run rollup -- build/right-angled.js --output.file dist/right-angled.es5.js --output.format es
scripts.copy:assets: npm run cpy -- "**/*.*" "!**/*.js" "../dist" --parents --cwd=build && npm run cpy -- src/package.json dist && npm run cpy -- README.md dist && npm run cpy -- CHANGELOG.md dist
scripts.sift: npm run clean:src && npm run clean:tests && npm run synt -- analyze src tests
scripts.preversion: npm run precommit && npm run copy:assets
scripts.version: npm run docs && git add -A docs && npm run changelog && git add CHANGELOG.md
scripts.postversion: git push && git push --tags && conventional-github-releaser -p angular
scripts.precommit: npm run clean:compile && npm run clean:tests && npm run lint && npm run compile && npm run copy:assets && npm run test
scripts.ci: npm run lint && npm run compile && npm run test
scripts.clean:tests: npm run rimraf -- coverage && npm run rimraf -- "tests/**/*.+(js|js.map|d.ts|metadata.json)"
scripts.docs: npm run rimraf -- docs && typedoc --options typedoc.json src/ && npm run docs:replace:paths
scripts.test: npm run clean:tests && karma start karma.conf.js
scripts.test:watch: npm run clean:tests && karma start karma.conf.debug.js
